battle_traits.name: Rune Of Fury
battle_traits.description: The rune of fury grants the Fyreslayers a portion of their god's battle rage.
battle_traits.effect: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Ur-gold Rune abilities this battle round. For the rest of the battle round, friendly Fyreslayers units have Strike-first while they are in combat with an enemy unit that charged in the same turn.

battle_traits.name: Rune Of Farsight
battle_traits.description: Empowered by this rune, the Fyreslayers hurl their throwing axes into the enemy with devastating accuracy.
battle_traits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Ur-gold Rune abilities this battle round.  Pick any number of enemy units within 10" of any visible friendly Fyreslayers units to be targets.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battle_traits.name: RUNE OF FIERY DETER MINATION:
battle_traits.description: A sliver of Grimnir's awesome resolve courses through the Fyreslayers.
battle_traits.effect: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Ur-gold Rune abilities this battle round. Friendly Fyreslayers units have Ward (5+) for the rest of the battle round.

battle_traits.name: Rune Of Relentless Zeal
battle_traits.description: The hearts of the Fyreslayers swell with a fiery conviction that sees them bear down upon the foe with surprising swiftness.
battle_traits.effect: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Ur-gold Rune abilities this battle round. For the rest of the battle round, friendly Fyreslayers units can use Charge abilities even if they used a Run ability in the same turn.

battle_traits.name: Rune Of Searing Heat
battle_traits.description: The edges of the Fyreslayers' weapons glow with the heat of the forge.
battle_traits.effect: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Ur-gold Rune abilities this battle round. Melee weapons used by friendly Fyreslayers units have Crit (Mortal) for the rest of the battle round.

Warrior Kinband.name: Berserk Kindred
Warrior Kinband.description: Filled with the fierce fighting spirit of Grimnir, the Warrior Kinband hurls itself at the foe. In their fury, they wield their glinting fyresteel axes so quickly that they appear as a blazing blur.
Warrior Kinband.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Fyreslayers Infantry units that charged in the same turn.

Scales Of Vulcatrix.name: Ancient Bloodlines
Scales Of Vulcatrix.description: Among the most elite formations of the Fyreslayers are the mighty Scales of Vulcatrix. The proud and majestic Magmadroths in this formation are as venerated as those of their lodge's royal family.
Scales Of Vulcatrix.effect: Add 2 to the Health characteristic of friendly Magmadroth units.

Forge Brethren.name: BULWARK OF MOLTEN STONE:
Forge Brethren.description: Shrouded in the shimmering heat of the forge-temple, the Forge Brethren direct their magmapikes to form blazing barricades of lava with sustained volleys of fire, before returning to blasting their enemies to ash.
Forge Brethren.effect: Add 1 to save rolls for friendly Infantry units while they are wholly within friendly territory.

Lords Of The Lodge.name: Stubborn Will
Lords Of The Lodge.description: The Lords of the Lodge burn with a rage tempered by sacred oaths of war.
Lords Of The Lodge.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of friendly Fyreslayers Heroes. In addition, the control scores of Fyreslayers Heroes cannot be modified by enemy abilities.

heroic_traits.name: Blood Of The Berzerker
heroic_traits.description: In this noble duardin is fiery aggression given form.
heroic_traits.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly Fyreslayers units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

heroic_traits.name: Ash-Beard
heroic_traits.description: So great is this priest's mastery of magmic energies that they smoulder eternally with Grimnir's power.
heroic_traits.effect: If this unit is not a Priest, they have Priest (1). If this unit was already a Priest, add 1 to this unit's chanting rolls.

heroic_traits.name: Fiercely Competitive
heroic_traits.description: This leader is incredibly stubborn and won't back down from even the boldest of challenges.
heroic_traits.effect: If this unit is in combat with an enemy unit that has Strike-first, this unit has Strike-first. If this unit is in combat with an enemy unit that uses the 'All-out Attack' command, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit's attacks for the rest of the turn.

artefacts_of_power.name: Ash-Cloud Rune
artefacts_of_power.description: The bearer of this rune can call down a column of soot that blankets the battlefield.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Until the start of your next turn, friendly Infantry units cannot be targeted by shooting attacks while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

artefacts_of_power.name: Magmalt
artefacts_of_power.description: A single draught of this fiery beverage sends shivers of energy surging through a Fyreslayer from toes to crest.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

artefacts_of_power.name: Droth-Helm
artefacts_of_power.description: This ancient helm is said to have been worn by the first Zharrgrim priest to tame a Magmadroth.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for Companion weapons used by friendly Fyreslayers units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

prayer_lore.name: Prayer Of Ash
prayer_lore.description: Borne on a gust of hot forge-winds, a circle of ash settles around the  Borne on a gust of hot forge-winds, a circle of ash settles around the priest's allies, protecting them from harm.
prayer_lore.declare: Pick a friendly Fyreslayers Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly Fyreslayers unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
prayer_lore.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that friendly unit until the start of your next turn. If the chanting roll was 8+, also subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of attacks that target that friendly unit until the start of your next turn.

prayer_lore.name: PRAYER OF GRIMNIR'S FURY:
prayer_lore.description: A red rage fills the hearts of those blessed by this furious benediction.
prayer_lore.declare: Pick a friendly Fyreslayers Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly Fyreslayers Infantry Hero wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
prayer_lore.effect: The target can use 2 Fight abilities this turn. After the first is used, however, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 8+, also add 1 to wound rolls for the target's combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

prayer_lore.name: Wrath Of Vulcatrix
prayer_lore.description: The priest sets the runes pressed into a Magmadroth's hide ablaze, and the colossal beast roars with fury.
prayer_lore.declare: Pick a friendly Fyreslayers Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly Magmadroth unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
prayer_lore.effect: For the rest of the turn, the 'Battle Damaged' ability has no effect on the target and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target's Companion weapons. If the chanting roll was 8+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target's Companion weapons for every 4 damage points the target has.

manifestation_lore.name: Summon Runic Fyrewall
manifestation_lore.description: At the command of a Zharrgrim priest, a Runic Fyrewall can be raised from the fiery chasms far beneath their soot- stained feet. Glinting with runes, this scintillating barrier of gold and flame bars the enemy's path and protects the flanks of the Fyreslayers' fyrds as they press ever forward.
manifestation_lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Runic Fyrewall on the battlefield, pick a friendly Fyreslayers Priest to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
manifestation_lore.effect: Set up a Runic Fyrewall wholly within 12" of the chanter and visible to them.

manifestation_lore.name: Flame-Spitter
manifestation_lore.description: By concentrating their magmic powers, a Zharrgrim priest can summon forth fiery heat from the bowels of the realm. With a rumble and a crack, an angry geyser opens up in the earth, bombarding the foe with molten death.
manifestation_lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Zharrgron Flame-spitter on the battlefield, pick a friendly Fyreslayers Priest to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
manifestation_lore.effect: Set up a Zharrgron Flame-spitter wholly within 12" of the chanter and visible to them.

manifestation_lore.name: Summon Molten Infernoth
manifestation_lore.description: An elemental manifestation that personifies the blazing wrath of Vulcatrix, a Molten Infernoth can be drawn to battle by a Zharrgrim priest. Bursting out of the realm's crust, the ferocious entity lumbers across the battlefield, inspiring Fyreslayers while blasting the enemy with raging torrents of lava.
manifestation_lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Molten Infernoth on the battlefield, pick a friendly Fyreslayers Priest to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
manifestation_lore.effect: Set up a Molten Infernoth wholly within 12" of the chanter, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Magmadroth's Claws and Horns is 4.

abilities.name: Raging Inferno
abilities.description: Throwing back its head, a Magmadroth can spew a wave of flaming bile that scorches through enemy armour.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Warrior-Kings
abilities.description: With discipline and zeal in equal measure, the Runefather inspires his warriors to bring down the wrath of Grimnir upon any who oppose them.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Fyreslayers units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Volcanic Blood
abilities.description: Born of fire and flame, Magmadroths pulse with the throbbing heat of the volcanic caverns in which they make their fyrenests.
abilities.effect: If you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Magmadroth's Claws and Horns is 4.

abilities.name: V Ying For Glory
abilities.description: Runesons seek their father's favour in battle by slaying the most fearsome enemy creatures.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit destroys a Monster, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's Ancestral Weapons for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Dominating Roar
abilities.description: The Flame-scale Youngbloods ridden by Auric Runesons are fiercely territorial when faced with a monstrous challenger.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: If this unit has fewer damage points than the target, subtract 10 from the target's control score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Volcanic Blood
abilities.description: Born of fire and flame, Magmadroths pulse with the throbbing heat of the volcanic caverns in which they make their fyrenests.
abilities.effect: If you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Magmadroth's Claws and Horns is 4.

abilities.name: Runic Empower Ment
abilities.description: With a sonorous chant, the Runesmiter draws forth the power of the ur-gold runes set into the flesh of their Fyreslayer kin.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Fyreslayers unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to wound rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Lashing Tail
abilities.description: Magmadroths can use their muscular spiked tails to pulverise lesser prey with a single swipe.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of models in the target unit, inflict D3+3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Volcanic Blood
abilities.description: Born of fire and flame, Magmadroths pulse with the throbbing heat of the volcanic caverns in which they make their fyrenests.
abilities.effect: If you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Royal Retinue
abilities.description: Auric Runefathers go to battle flanked by the most skilled warriors in the lodge, who are sworn to protect him from harm.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-Hero Fyreslayers Infantry unit within this unit's combat range to be the royal retinue.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, while the royal retinue is wholly within 6" of this unit, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by the royal retinue and this unit has Ward (4+).

abilities.name: Commanding Presence
abilities.description: The presence of a Runefather in the Fyreslayer battleline bolsters the warriors' already considerable will, ensuring that the doughty duardin will hold their ground and slog it out with any foe.
abilities.effect: Add the current battle round number to the control scores of friendly Fyreslayers Infantry units wholly within 12" of this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.reaction_condition: You declared a Fight ability   for this unit
abilities.name: Dauntless Assault
abilities.description: Eager to prove themselves in battle, Auric Runesons are at their best leading from the front lines alongside their allies.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Fyreslayers Infantry unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit's combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: Fearless Charge
abilities.description: Fearless and bold, Auric Runesons show their devotion to Grimnir with daring assaults and furious charges.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly Fyreslayers Infantry units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

abilities.name: Magmic Tunnelling
abilities.description: A Runesmiter standing upon stone can command the rock to allow them passage.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 1 unit in its regiment if neither unit has been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up those units in reserve underground. They have now been deployed.

abilities.name: Emergence
abilities.description: The ground opens up to reveal the Runesmiter and their entourage.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is underground.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, set up the other unit that was set up underground with it (if any) wholly within 6" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: HIGH PRIEST OF THE ZHARRGRIM:
abilities.description: The Zharrgrim order of every Fyreslayer lodge is led by an Auric Runemaster, a revered individual attuned to their deity like no other.
abilities.effect: Each time a Prayer chanted by this unit is answered, this unit gains a magmic power token.

abilities.reaction_condition: You declared an Ur-gold   Rune ability
abilities.name: Master Of The Runes
abilities.description: Drawing upon the divine power released by sacred battle, Runemasters are able to awaken the full potential of their ur-gold runes.
abilities.effect: Remove 3 of this unit's magmic power tokens. If you do so, apply the effect below that corresponds to the Ur-gold Rune ability that was used: Rune of Fury: For the rest of the battle round, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Fyreslayers units while they have Strike-first. Rune of Fiery Determination: Add 1 to save rolls for friendly Fyreslayers units for the rest of the battle round. Rune of Relentless Zeal: Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for friendly Fyreslayers units for the rest of the battle round. Rune of Searing Heat: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Fyreslayers units for the rest of the battle round. Rune of Farsight: Increase the range of the 'Rune of Farsight' ability to 16".

abilities.name: Icon Of Grimnir
abilities.description: The Battlesmith raises their icon of Grimnir and recounts tales of past glories, inspiring their allies and setting their ur-gold runes ablaze so that they might fight until the bitter end.
abilities.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to the control scores of friendly Fyreslayers units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Bard Of The Lodge
abilities.description: Standing defiant in front of the enemy, a Battlesmith recites tales of the lodge's glorious history, rallying the warriors around them.
abilities.effect: If a friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the 'Rally' command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

abilities.name: Grimwrath Oaths
abilities.description: Before battle, each Grimwrath Berzerker swears a sacred oath to Grimnir that they will fulfil a certain deed in his honour that day.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following oaths for this unit to swear: 'I will guard them with my life!': While this unit is wholly within 6" of another friendly Fyreslayers Hero: 
* Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit's attacks. 
* Add 1 to ward rolls for this unit.  If a friendly Fyreslayers Hero wholly within 6" of this unit is destroyed, this effect no longer applies. 'I will not be stopped!': Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit, and add 1 to save rolls for this unit while it is in combat. If this unit uses the 'Retreat' or 'Rally' abilities, this effect no longer applies.

abilities.name: Battle-Fury
abilities.description: Hewing left and right with their greataxe, a Grimwrath Berzerker enters a state of single- minded frenzy.
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, it can use 2 Fight abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has Strike-last for the rest of the phase.

abilities.name: MASTERFLAME RUNE: A
abilities.description: Flamekeeper's sacred symbol of office can harness the power within ur-gold runes of fallen warriors to bestow blessings of Grimnir upon their brethren.
abilities.declare: If any friendly units have been destroyed during the battle, pick a friendly Fyreslayers Infantry unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of Fyreslayers units that have been destroyed during the battle, pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn: Grimnir's Grit: The target has Ward (5+). Grimnir's Resolve: Add 2 to charge rolls for the target. Grimnir's Vengeance: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the target's melee weapons.

abilities.name: Oathbound
abilities.description: A Doomseeker chooses their quarry and shouts a vow to Grimnir that they will either destroy the enemy or die trying.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit to be this unit's quarry. You can pick a unit that has been deployed in reserve.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made by this unit that target its quarry. If this unit is destroyed while it is in combat with its quarry, inflict 3 mortal damage on this unit's quarry immediately after the ability that destroyed this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: Runic Power
abilities.description: As a Doomseeker gets closer to their fate, they call upon the power of their many ur-gold runes, ensuring either their victory or that they go down in a final blaze of glory.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's melee weapons while this unit has 1 damage point. Add 2 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's melee weapons instead while this unit has 2 or more damage points.

abilities.name: Last Of The Lodge-Fire
abilities.description: In desperate need, a Grimhold Exile can draw upon the embers of the Zharrkhul by striking their hammer-faces together, setting a powerful foe ablaze with the flames of Grimnir's wrath.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the target's Health characteristic. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Honour To Grimnir!
abilities.description: Grimhold Exiles exhort their fellow duardin to fight with the vigour of their fallen god.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly Fyreslayers Infantry units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: You can re-roll charge rolls for the targets for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Berserk Fury
abilities.description: No Fyreslayer will easily accept death's embrace while their kin are still fighting.
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: WHIRLWIND OF DESTRUCTION:
abilities.description: With the light of Grimnir burning in their eyes, these impetuous warriors hurl themselves into the fray, leaving a trail of death in their wake.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons if this unit charged this turn.

abilities.name: Molten Rockbolts
abilities.description: Enemies struck by magmapike bolts find their movements become increasingly sluggish as the burning rock cools and rapidly solidifies on their armour and flesh.
abilities.effect: Each time a shooting attack made by this unit scores a critical hit, subtract 1" from the target unit's Move characteristic until the start of your next turn. This ability cannot reduce the target unit's unmodified Move characteristic below half.

abilities.name: Drothmasters
abilities.description: Vulkyn Flameseekers are skilled at dominating monstrous wild beasts.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract D3 from the Damage characteristic of the target's Companion melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Duty Unto Death
abilities.description: Hearthguard Berzerkers are sworn to protect their lodge and its masters until their dying breath.
abilities.effect: While any friendly Fyreslayers Infantry Heroes are wholly within this unit's combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have Ward (5+).

abilities.name: Smouldering Braziers
abilities.description: With each swing of a flamestrike poleaxe, the brazier chained to it arcs towards the foe, sparks and fire trailing in its wake.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Duty Unto Death
abilities.description: Hearthguard Berzerkers are sworn to protect their lodge and its masters until their dying breath.
abilities.effect: While any friendly Fyreslayers Infantry Heroes are wholly within this unit's combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have Ward (5+).

abilities.name: Fires Of Vengeance
abilities.description: Should one of the elders of the lodge be harmed while under the protection of Hearthguard Berzerkers, they are sent into such a vengeful rage that they become nigh unstoppable.
abilities.effect: While this unit is within the combat ranges of any damaged friendly Fyreslayers Heroes, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons.

abilities.name: Flamescarred
abilities.description: Those wounded by a Molten Infernoth are left scorched and writhing in pain.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this Manifestation's attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target's combat attacks until the end of your next turn.

abilities.name: Roaring Rune-Fire
abilities.description: The leaping flames of a Runic Fyrewall act as a barrier that only creatures born of fire can pass.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 6" of this Manifestation to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+: 
* Inflict an amount of mortal damage on  the target equal to the roll. 
* Subtract 3 from the target's control  score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Magma Blast
abilities.description: At the beck of a Zharrgrim Priest, the Zharrgron Flame- spitter hurls forth a fiery orb that arcs across the sky before detonating in an explosion of flame amidst the enemy lines.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this Manifestation's shooting attacks if the target unit has 10 or more models. Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls instead if the target unit has 15 or more models.

abilities.name: Spending The Forge
abilities.description: In times of need, a Zharrgrim priest may expend all of the Magmic Battleforge's power, igniting the ur-gold runes of their Fyreslayer kin and infusing the warriors with strength.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Fyreslayers Priest within this terrain feature's combat range to expend the power of the forge.
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) each friendly Fyreslayers unit on the battlefield. Once this ability has been used, this terrain feature cannot use the 'Molten Blessing' abiity for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Molten Blessing
abilities.description: Drawing upon the powerful elemental energies of the Magmic Battleforge, a Zharrgrim priest casts clouds of cinders into the air, imbuing those of their sacred order with burning power.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Fyreslayers Priest within this terrain feature's combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to chanting rolls for the target for the rest of the turn. In addition, the target can use the 'Unbind' ability this turn as if it had Wizard (1).
